sourcing.instructions: Acetylacetone: Chemical supply stores or online chemical suppliers.
steps: Acetylacetone: Chemical supply stores or online chemical suppliers.
1. In a fume hood, measure 80 g of acetylacetone into a clean beaker.
preparation.raw_text: 1. In a fume hood, measure 80 g of acetylacetone into a clean beaker.

steps: 1. Transfer the mixture to a heat-resistant container.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the mixture to a heat-resistant container.

steps: 1. Remove the container from the heat source and allow it to cool to room temperature (approximately 20-25°C).
cooling.raw_text: 1. Remove the container from the heat source and allow it to cool to room temperature (approximately 20-25°C).

steps: 1. Filter the solid material from the solution using vacuum filtration.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Filter the solid material from the solution using vacuum filtration.
